Perfect Bake® recipe

Home Perfect Bake recipes Brioche

Brioche

Login to rate this recipe
Tweet
Share
Most people think brioche is difficult to make, but this recipe will change that perception completely. Making Brioche is a little time consuming, but most of the time is spent waiting. You may find it so easy to make you'll stop reserving it for special occasions.

Ingredients

Units:
US | Metric
Metric | US
  • Water - 1 oz
  • Active Dry Yeast - 1/4 oz
  • Granulated Sugar - 3⅛ oz
  • Unsalted Butter - 3⅞ oz
  • Milk - 6⅜ oz
  • Vanilla Extract - 1/8 oz
  • Egg - 3⅝ oz
  • Bread Flour - 1⅛ lb
  • Kosher Salt - 1/4 oz
  • Egg - 1¾ oz
  • Water - 3/8 oz

Servings

2 loaves

Learn how to adjust serving sizes in Perfect Bake

Directions

1. Connect your Perfect Bake Scale + Recipe App

2. Tap the badge

When you see our badge next to a recipe on any participating site, that means it's Perfect Bake compatible.

3. Get the Recipe

Once you've tapped our badge, the recipe you wanted automatically downloads to your phone or tablet.
